extendedInfo.description: Dress up animals. Pet lover's who love to pamper their pets. Here's a game where you can pamper them at the pet parlour. - Choose to pamper your cat, dog, or pony. - Lots of breeds to choose from, whether you like calico cats or tabby cats, pugs to poodles, and more.- You can dress them up in cool and cute outfits. - You can groom your pony, give your puppy a bath, or blow dry your cat's hair.** Get the paid version for ad free game play and more animals and more items. **InstructionsDress UpChoose your pet and start dressing them up. Icons on the right are the main categories + Backgrounds+ Animals+ Hats+ Wigs+ Coats+ Footwear+ AccessoriesWhen done you can save to your phone photo album or game gallery.GroomingChoose your pony and start grooming by tapping one of the activity icons on the righta - Brush - Move your finger over your pony to brush the coatb - Hoof Cleaning - Tap your finger over the hoof area to remove dirtc - Perfume - Tap on your pony to spray some perfume on the coatHair StylingChoose your cat and start styling awaya - Tap on the Down arrow to lower the dryerb - When dryer has finished tap on the UP arrow to raise the dryer c - Repeat to see what style will appear nextBath TimeChoose your dog and get started by tapping on the icons at the bottoma - Shower - Tap and hold down on the shower icon to shower your dogb - Bubbles - Tap and hold down on the bubble box icon to add bubbles to the bathc - Brush - Move your finger over your dog to brush the dirt awayd - Towel - Move your finger over the dog to dry

reviews.title: DON\'T GET THIS PIECE OF CRAP
